name: Airbnb Listing Finder Agent
description: AI agent that finds Airbnb listings based on natural language queries, searches and filters listings, and presents top 10 recommendations.
longDescription: An AI agent that understands natural language queries, searches, analyzes, and filters Airbnb listings to present the top 10 recommendations with direct links. Automates the accommodation search process.

businessImpact.keyMetric: Improves match quality by applying all user-defined criteria
